content.text:
# 9th Indie Series Awards

|site=The Colony Theatre, Los Angeles|host=Patrika Darbo|producer=|director=|most_wins=Ladies of the Lake (4)|most_nominations=Ladies of the Lake (18)|network=|duration=|ratings=|last=8th|next=10th|preshow=}}The 9th Indie Series Awards were held on April 4, 2018, at The Colony Theatre in Los Angeles, with the ceremony hosted by Emmy Award-winner Patrika Darbo. Presented by We Love Soaps, the awards recognize independently produced, scripted entertainment created for the web.
Ladies of the Lake led all series with 18 total nominations, followed by The Bay with 16. Filth City led all comedies with 12 nominations. The first ever category for unscripted shows was added this year.
Awards
The awards were given on April 4, 2017. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface:
